Definition:  FPOW
Refer to
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 2.A.1.a
for the definition of
former prisoner of war
(FPOW).
Reference
:  For more information on verifying FPOW status, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 2.A.1
, and
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 2.C.1.a
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 1 - Priority Processing Programs and Special Requirements
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section None
